special care to close the slight gap at the start of the cast-on soak press out excess water and let dry a k a blocking well done your socks are now ready to warm a pair of little feet preemie knitting note this pattern includes sizes even for very small preemies around 1 kg / 2 lbs please be aware that preemies are not always allowed to wear clothes partly on account of their extremely delicate skin i have chosen to still include the smallest size for several reasons even if they may never get worn these socks may serve a purpose a memento for those involved and may be a way of letting your loved ones in the nicu know that you are thinking of them
